page.title: 02 Osbaston-Where I live
page.content: Osbaston is one of the main residential areas of Monmouth.I like living there as most of the houses have a magnificent western view over the Monnow Valley. The houses are well looked after,and each house contributes a little to make Osbaston look so beautiful.It is a quiet district with few cars travelling through the area.The houses tend to be expensive with prices often exceeding 50,000 pounds. Living in Osbaston does have some disadvantages.The roads are very narrow and are often being repaired,there are also a lot of very sharp corners.It must be particularly difficult for the elderly,as it is so hilly.There are no buses to the town centre,which is about a mile away,so you need private transport.There is no nearby shop,which is inconvenient.
